sentences.sContent: But in the morass of all this minutiae, we seem to be missing the point.
sentences.sContent_eng: But in the morass of all this minutiae, we seem to be missing the point.
sentences.sCn: 但在一切细节的沼泽中，我们似乎漏掉了一点。

synos.tran: 沼泽；困境；乱糟糟的一堆

trans.tranOther: a dangerous area of soft wet ground
